document_data.name: Fried Bones Salad
document_data.mainbody: '''Fried bones salad''' was one of the specialty side dishes served at the ramshackle [[Owlroost Head Inn]] in the [[Amn]]ian town of [[Purskul]] as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Fried bones salad was made using [[taro]]s and [[plantain]]s. They were wedged, battered, and deep-fried. [[Elminster]] compared the dish to [[Wikipedia:tempura|tempura]] found on [[Earth]]. Fried bones salad was one of three types of [[cloaks (food)|cloaks]] served at the Owlroost Head Inn. Others included fried fluffy [[lemon]]-flavored mashed [[potato]]s and [[squid]]-stuffed [[yam]]s.
